The paragraph does not mention any diseases. It is discussing the role of endogenous dopamine in salience coding during associative learning. Endogenous refers to something that originates within the organism itself, so it is not a disease. Salience coding is a cognitive process, and associative learning is a type of learning where an association is formed between two or more stimuli. Neither of these concepts are diseases.
